an3.131:1.3: Matugamo, bhikkhave, paticchanno avahati, no vivato;
an3.131:1.4: brahmananam, bhikkhave, manta paticchanna avahanti, no vivata;
an3.131:1.5: micchaditthi, bhikkhave, paticchanna avahati, no vivata.
an3.131:1.6: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini paticchannani avahanti, no vivatani.
an3.131:2.1: Tinimani, bhikkhave, vivatani virocanti, no paticchannani.
an3.131:2.3: Candamandalam, bhikkhave, vivatam virocati, no paticchannam;
an3.131:2.4: suriyamandalam, bhikkhave, vivatam virocati, no paticchannam;
an3.131:2.5: tathagatappavedito dhammavinayo, bhikkhave, vivato virocati, no paticchanno.
an3.131:2.6: Imani kho, bhikkhave, tini vivatani virocanti, no paticchannani”ti.
